p: The behavior of this essential oil shows that the loss is lesser than those observed in the previously described essential oils with a constant but slow decay through time ( Table 4). The best mathematical model that explains this behavior is Sq-Y SqRt-X, with the same meaning for “Y” and “X” as above. With an R 2 = 0.6405 and RMSE of 1.14 × 10 4, the equation that represents the model is EO amount as GC peak areas = sqrt(6.23172E11 − 5.33363E10 * sqrt(Day #))
